data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Garhwa, Jharkhand, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Garhwa, Jharkhand, India

data.prayer: Lord, make the 14,551 believers in Garhwa to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,308,249 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Garhwa, Jharkhand, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, fill the 1,322,800 souls living in the county of Garhwa with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, move the 14,551 believers in the county of Garhwa to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please raise up prophets in Garhwa who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, convict the 14,551 believers in Garhwa to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary:
the county of Garhwa, Jharkhand, India has a population of 1,322,800.

We estimate Garhwa has 14,551 people who might know Jesus, 16,050 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,292,199 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Garhwa access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
